trans-unit.source: Calculates the text display rectangle from the window rectangle

seg-source.mrk: Calculates the text display rectangle from the window rectangle

target.mrk: Calculates the text display rectangle from the window rectangle

trans-unit.source: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

target.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

trans-unit.source: $tagRECT structure that holds a window or text display rectangle

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure that holds a window or text display rectangle

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure that holds a window or text display rectangle

trans-unit.source: [optional] Value that specifies which operation to perform. If True, $tRECT is used to specify a text display rectangle and it receives the corresponding window rectangle. If False, $tRECT is used to specify a window rectangle and it receives the corresponding text display rectangle.

seg-source.mrk: Value that specifies which operation to perform.
If True, $tRECT is used to specify a text display rectangle and it receives the corresponding window rectangle.
If False, $tRECT is used to specify a window rectangle and it receives the corresponding text display rectangle.

target.mrk: Value that specifies which operation to perform.
If True, $tRECT is used to specify a text display rectangle and it receives the corresponding window rectangle.
If False, $tRECT is used to specify a window rectangle and it receives the corresponding text display rectangle.

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip's window rectangle is somewhat larger than the text display rectangle that bounds the ToolTip string.

seg-source.mrk: The ToolTip's window rectangle is somewhat larger than the text display rectangle that bounds the ToolTip string.

target.mrk: The ToolTip's window rectangle is somewhat larger than the text display rectangle that bounds the ToolTip string.

trans-unit.source: The window origin is also offset up and to the left from the origin of the text display rectangle.

seg-source.mrk: The window origin is also offset up and to the left from the origin of the text display rectangle.

target.mrk: The window origin is also offset up and to the left from the origin of the text display rectangle.

trans-unit.source: To position the text display rectangle, you must calculate the corresponding window rectangle and use that rectangle to position the ToolTip.

seg-source.mrk: To position the text display rectangle, you must calculate the corresponding window rectangle and use that rectangle to position the ToolTip.

target.mrk: To position the text display rectangle, you must calculate the corresponding window rectangle and use that rectangle to position the ToolTip.

trans-unit.source: If you set $bLarger to True, _GUIToolTip_AdjustRect() takes the size and position of the desired ToolTip text display rectangle, and passes back the size and position of the ToolTip window needed to display the text in the specified position.

seg-source.mrk: If you set $bLarger to True, _GUIToolTip_AdjustRect() takes the size and position of the desired ToolTip text display rectangle, and passes back the size and position of the ToolTip window needed to display the text in the specified position.

target.mrk: If you set $bLarger to True, _GUIToolTip_AdjustRect() takes the size and position of the desired ToolTip text display rectangle, and passes back the size and position of the ToolTip window needed to display the text in the specified position.

trans-unit.source: If you set $bLarger to False you can specify a ToolTip window rectangle and _GUIToolTip_AdjustRect() will return the size and position of its text rectangle.

seg-source.mrk: If you set $bLarger to False you can specify a ToolTip window rectangle and _GUIToolTip_AdjustRect() will return the size and position of its text rectangle.

target.mrk: If you set $bLarger to False you can specify a ToolTip window rectangle and _GUIToolTip_AdjustRect() will return the size and position of its text rectangle.
